Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [slack] <Regnar> just a thought, we should have a page on dexstats that shows a list of all coins that are built on Komodo and/or using dPoW. Many of the dICO coins would be on it but GameCredits, Verus, and Kreds too. This page could be linked to from the main http://Komodoplatform.com. or could even be a page on http://Komodoplatform.com that shows the coins using dPoW for 51% protection, as well as a link to whatever announcement page they have explaining their reasons for selecting KMD.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [slack] <Regnar> and on the dPoW/Komodo Security Services/51% protection page we could have some options for how other projects could get these features, either by integrating dPoW like Gamecredits (slower) or by migrating to Komodo (preferred)
